note:
Father first, musician second, programmer third, and a bunch of other things. I tend to get enthusiastic with things in the world. I like playing, in all sorts of ways. Lately my playing has involved integrating AI into my music videos.
I'm a jazz pianist by training and I write songs. Songs are a great opportunity to walk in someone else's shoes for a little while.
A couple of years ago I quit making music for a living so music could regain its sacred place in my life.
